scripts.dev-mode:disable: npm run dev-mode:on && npm run dev-mode:clean && npm i git+https://git@github.com/oskariorg/oskari-frontend.git#develop
scripts.dev-mode:enable: npm run dev-mode:off && npm run dev-mode:available && npm run dev-mode:clean && npm i ../oskari-frontend
scripts.build: npm run dev-mode:off && webpack --config ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/webpack.config.js --mode production --progress --env env.appdef=apps --env env.absolutePublicPath=true
scripts.build:test: npm run dev-mode:off && webpack --config ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/webpack.config.js --mode production --progress --env env.appdef=apps --env env.absolutePublicPath=true --env env.domain=https://kartat.tampere.fi/oskaritest
scripts.start: npm run dev-mode:off && webpack-dev-server --config ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/webpack.config.js --hot --env env.appdef=devapp:apps --env env.absolutePublicPath=true
scripts.start:dev: npm run dev-mode:on && npm run dev-mode:on && node ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server.js --config ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/webpack.config.js --hot --env env.appdef=devapp:apps --env env.absolutePublicPath=true
scripts.build:dev: npm run dev-mode:on && npm run dev-mode:on && node ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config ./node_modules/oskari-frontend/webpack.config.js --mode production --progress --env env.appdef=apps --env env.absolutePublicPath=true
